resources.string: Customize how Scanium looks, scans, and protects your data.

Scanium is built and maintained independently. If the app helps you save time or money, you can support its development by buying me a coffee. Every contribution helps keep the app improving â€” thank you!
Capture quality, storage, and scan behavior
Diagnostics, debug tools, and experimental flags
Choose how Scanium adapts to system dark mode
Choose the language used in the app
Show the tour again to review app features
Save captured items to device storage
Best accuracy using your configured backend
Reduce cloud usage by spacing requests
Controls how strict matching must be
Automatically open the items list after a scan if items were found
Save locations, export formats, and cache management
Display bounding boxes around detected items
Allow cropped thumbnails for visual context
Use the mic button for hands-free questions
Speak final answers using on-device TTS
Language for speech recognition and TTS
Play subtle cues for key actions
Send images to cloud for better accuracy
Learn how we process your data
Active â€“ no data leaves this device
Disable all cloud sharing with one tap
Restore defaults for cloud and diagnostics
Unlock the full power of Scanium with unlimited cloud classifications and advanced assistant features.
Scanium needs camera access to scan and catalog items in your environment.
Point at items to identify and catalog them
Start continuous scanning (tap again to stop)
ðŸ”’ All processing happens on your device. Images are never uploaded without your permission.
Select your preferred language for the app
You\'re all set to start scanning and cataloging objects. Happy scanning!
Let\'s take a quick tour of the main features:
View all your scanned items in an organized list
Select items and export them for other apps
Get pricing and export help from the AI assistant
Customize settings and preferences from the menu
Let\'s take a quick tour to learn how to scan, edit, and share your items.
Tap the shutter button to take a photo of your first item. Point your camera at any object you want to catalog.
Tap here to open your scanned items list. The badge shows how many items you\'ve captured.
Capture additional angles or details. Multiple photos help buyers see your item better and improve AI descriptions.
Fill in brand, type, color, size, and other attributes. Better details mean better listings and faster sales.
Let AI create a professional marketplace description using your photos and attributes. Get pricing insights too!
Tap Save to keep your changes. Your item will be ready for export.
Select items and tap the share button to export them as images, text, or a ZIP bundle for listing platforms.
You\'re all set to scan, catalog, and sell your items. Happy scanning!
Scanium is a camera-first application that uses machine learning to detect and identify objects in real-time, helping you value and list items for resale.

Export to spreadsheets, chat apps, or marketplaces.
No attributes detected yet. Attributes will be extracted during cloud classification.
Ask AI assistant about this item
Confirming will mark this as verified.
Items without AI-generated descriptions will use fallback text and be marked as \'NEEDS_AI\' in the export.
Generate a compelling title, description, and bullet points for your listing.

Object detected outside scan zone. Center it for better results.
No objects detected. Try pointing at prominent items.

Camera access has been disabled for Scanium. To scan and catalog items, please enable camera access in your device settings.
